0.title: Network interface packets received on host
0.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.net.nic.packets.rx), by: { dt.entity.host }
| fieldsAdd host.net.nic.packets.rx = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.net.nic.packets.rx)`)
| sort host.net.nic.packets.rx desc
| limit 20

1.title: Network interface packets sent on host
1.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.net.nic.packets.tx), by: { dt.entity.host }
| fieldsAdd host.net.nic.packets.tx = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.net.nic.packets.tx)`)
| sort host.net.nic.packets.tx desc
| limit 20

2.title: Network interface bytes received on host
2.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.net.nic.bytes_rx), by: { dt.entity.host }
| fieldsAdd host.net.nic.bytes_rx = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.net.nic.bytes_rx)`)
| sort host.net.nic.bytes_rx desc
| limit 20

3.title: Network interface bytes sent on host
3.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.net.nic.bytes_tx), by: { dt.entity.host }
| fieldsAdd host.net.nic.bytes_tx = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.net.nic.bytes_tx)`)
| sort host.net.nic.bytes_tx desc
| limit 20

| limit 20

7.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.net.nic.packets.errors_tx), by: { dt.entity.host }
| fieldsAdd host.net.nic.packets.errors_tx = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.net.nic.packets.errors_tx)`)

timeseries avg(dt.host.net.nic.link_util_rx), by: { dt.entity.host }
| fieldsAdd host.net.nic.link_util_rx = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.net.nic.link_util_rx)`)
| sort host.net.nic.link_util_rx desc
| limit 20
